justdial_lead_generator.scraper.justdial_scraper module¶

JustDial Scraper (with anti-bot driver setup).

class justdial_lead_generator.scraper.justdial_scraper.JustDialScraper(driver: WebDriver, wait_time: int = 5)[source]¶

Bases: object

A scraper for extracting business listings and details from JustDial.

static create_chrome_driver(headless: bool = True, user_agent: str = None) → WebDriver[source]¶

Create a Chrome WebDriver instance with anti-bot options.

Parameters:

  • headless (bool) – Run Chrome in headless mode if True.

  • user_agent (str, optional) – Custom user-agent string.

Returns:

Configured Chrome WebDriver.

Return type:

webdriver.Chrome

get_listings()[source]¶

Retrieve listing elements from the page.

Returns:

A list of Selenium WebElements representing listings.

Return type:

list

load_page(url: str)[source]¶

Load a given webpage in the browser.

Parameters:

url (str) – The URL to load.

parse_listing(listing)[source]¶

Extract structured information from a single listing element.

Parameters:

listing (WebElement) – A Selenium element representing a business listing.

Returns:

Dictionary containing business details (name, address, rating, reviews, contact).

Return type:

dict

scroll_down(pause_time=1, max_scrolls=30)[source]¶

Scroll down the page multiple times to load dynamic content.

Parameters:

  • pause_time (int) – Delay between scrolls in seconds.

  • max_scrolls (int) – Maximum number of scroll actions to perform.
